sentences.en: But Hamas says, with some cogency, that it has been illegal for Mr Abbas to retain his post as the PA’s president since January this year, when his four-year term should have run out.
sentences.cn: 而哈马斯认为一月以后，鉴于阿巴斯的四年任期已到，若继续保持在巴权力机构的职位应被视为违法，这个看法还是比较中肯的。

sentences.en: The film makes its points with cogency and force.
sentences.cn: 影片强有力地阐明了主旨。

trans.tran_cn: （理论、议论等的）说服力，中肯切题
